Sentencas: Sr-Co containing perovskite oxides are prospective air electrode candidates for reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs).
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, their efficiencies are limited by Sr segregation and the high thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of Co-based perovskites.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Herein, La0.6Ca0.4Fe08Ni0.2O3-delta (LCaFN) is tailored as an Sr-Co-free perovskite air electrode for highperformance RSOCs.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Compared with La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Ni0.2O3-delta (LSFN) and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCoF), LCaFN has a high electrical conductivity (297 S cm(-1)), TEC compatibility (11.2 x 10(-6) K-1) and improved chemical stability.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Moreover, LCaFN has high oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) activity with a low polarization resistance (0.06 omega cm(2)) at 800 degrees C. A single-cell Ni-YSZ/YSZ/gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC)/LCaFN-GDC operated at 800 degrees C yields a maximum power density of 1.08 W cm(-2) using H-2 as fuel.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In the solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode, the cell can achieve a current density of approximately 1.2 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V with 70% humidity at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The cell exhibits good reversibility and remains stable in continuous SOEC and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) modes.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: These findings indicate the potential application of La0.6Ca0.4Fe0.8-Ni0.2O3-delta as an air electrode material for RSOCs.
Titulo: Tailored Sr-Co-free perovskite oxide as an air electrode for high-performance reversible solid oxide cells
